name: Iron Angel of the Apocalypse: The Return
overview: A cybernetic battle to the death for the soul of mankind! You will be assimilated, if you can stay alive that long! In the depths of space, Tetsujin has been reconstructed, and YOUR mind is now bonded to his mechanized body. The massive, clandestine SCH organization has given you life, but now what is their plan? The golden Android, too, has returned to take his revenge against you. Battle past moloids and biomoloids bent on your destruction, or humanity is doomed!
